DataElement.preferredName: Person Infection Requiring Antibiotic Therapy Personal Medical History Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The quantity of events related to a person having an active infection that requires antibiotic (substances produced by microorganisms or their derivatives that selectively target microorganisms) therapy (treatment of bacterial infections with antibiotics), as an element of a personal medical history (an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Infection Requiring Antibiotic Therapy Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person having an active infection that requires antibiotic (substances produced by microorganisms or their derivatives that selectively target microorganisms) therapy (treatment of bacterial infections with antibiotics), as an element of a personal medical history (an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced).

Property.preferredName: Infection Required Antibiotic Therapy Personal Medical History
Property.preferredDefinition: A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact.:Required; necessary, not optional.:Treatment of bacterial infections with antibiotics.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, fungal, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.
Treatment of bacterial infections with antibiotics.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of the specified item.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/11/17 tt transferred context, added reg status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task.

DataElement.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form
